thread.title: Lester gives up big HRs, Cubs fall to Mets in NLCS opener
thread.title_full: Lester gives up big HRs, Cubs fall to Mets in NLCS opener

title: Lester gives up big HRs, Cubs fall to Mets in NLCS opener
text:
> Sports Lester gives up big HRs, Cubs fall to Mets in NLCS opener Chicago Cubs pitcher Jon Lester reacts as he walks off the field during the sixth inning of Game 1 of the National League baseball championship series against the New York Mets Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in New York. (AP Photo/Julie Jacobson)
